Public NotInheritable Class IncrementalHash Implements IDisposable

summary.span: 支持跨多个段以增量方式计算哈希或基于哈希的消息验证代码 (HMAC) 值。

span.span: Provides support for computing a hash or Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) value incrementally across several segments.

summary.span: 获取正在执行的算法的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the algorithm being performed.

summary.span: HMAC 算法前面附有“HMAC”，以区别于未经加密的摘要。

span.span: HMAC algorithms are prepended with "HMAC" to distinguish them from an unkeyed digest.

value.span: 正在执行的算法的名称。

span.span: The name of the algorithm being performed.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash CreateHMAC (System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName hashAlgorithm, byte[] key);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash CreateHMAC(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName hashAlgorithm, unsigned int8[] key) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateHMAC (hashAlgorithm As HashAlgorithmName, key As Byte()) As IncrementalHash

param.name: hashAlgorithm
param.span: 要在 HMAC 内执行的哈希算法的名称。

span.span: The name of the hash algorithm to perform within the HMAC.

param.name: key
param.span: HMAC 的密钥。

span.span: The secret key for the HMAC.

param.span: 密钥可以为任何长度，但将对长度超过指定哈希算法的输出大小的密钥进行哈希处理，以便派生大小正确的密钥。

span.span: The key can be of any length, but a key longer than the output size of the specified hash algorithm will be hashed to derive a correctly-sized key.

param.span: 因此，建议的密钥大小为指定哈希算法的输出大小。

span.span: Therefore, the recommended size of the secret key is the output size of the specified hash algorithm.

span.span: An instance of the class ready to compute the specified hash algorithm.

param.span: 密钥可以为任何长度，但将对长度超过 指定的哈希算法的输出大小的密钥进行哈希处理（使用 指定的算法），以便派生大小正确的密钥。

span.span: The key can be any length, but a key longer than the output size of the hash algorithm specified by will be hashed (using the algorithm specified by ) to derive a correctly-sized key.

param.span: 因此，建议的密钥大小为 指定的哈希的输出大小。

span.span: Therefore, the recommended size of the secret key is the output size of the hash specified by .
